SEARCH
Package civitas.celestis.util.string

Interface Text

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
RichString
public interface Text extends Serializable
An object which is not a String, but represents a formatted string and can be easily converted to one.
See Also:
  • Format
  • RichString

    • equals

      boolean equals(@Nullable Object obj)
      Checks for equality between this text and the provided object obj.
      Overrides:
      equals in class Object
      Parameters:
      obj - The object to compare to
      Returns:
      true if the other object is a string and the contents are equal, or if the other object is a Text and the content and all attributes are equal

    • toString

      @Nonnull String toString()
      Serializes this object into a string. Note that this is the representation of this text as a string, not the actual content of this text. To get the raw content of this text, use content().
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      The string representation of this text
